item.title: Lab: Basic Network Recon
item.description:
Problem

I wanted to understand how basic service discovery works on a target host.

What I did

  • Used Nmap for port scanning
  • Verified results manually

What I learned

  • Differences between common scan types
  • Why open ports alone don’t mean a service is exploitable
